text:
My mother booked a 10:30am appointment with Ashford. I was unwell with three episodes of vomitting, multiple episodes of diarrhoea and prolonged phlegm.

Upon arriving, I checked in with the lovely receptionist and within 10 minutes, I was able to speak with Doctor Nam. I told him about my condition and my Urea-Breath Test I have on the 14th of May 2025 for my underlying gastric issues. He explained thoroughly of what the cause(s) may be. Afterwards, he prescribed medication and assured me that it will not affect the UBT.

After the appointment, I collected my medication and requested the receptionist for a hardcopy medical certificate as my school requires it. The receptionist also answered my questions about which medication I should take when I get home, putting a star next to the one for my diarrhoea. Within an hour, I was able to go to the clinic from my house and back.

I would like to thank Doctor Nam and his team for getting me back on my feet by that same Friday. I am very grateful for the excellent service and effective medication given to me. In the future, I hope to go to Ashford again when I fall ill. Highly recommended ❤️

- Ilhan (Went on Tuesday, 6 May 2025)

Dr Nam and his team were great. Came here multiple times for both myself and my wife. Did my annual health screening as well. Administratively, everything was seamless and convenient. Dr Nam also take the time and effort to explain the ailment and what your options are. Would come back again for sure!
My physiotherapist Bernard is friendly and skillful. My sincere thanks once again to him for helping me to achieve a lasting recovery.
First time been to their clinic for basic health screening, their package are cheaper & consists more tests. Also able to get result within 2 working days. Doctor & staff are very nice.

Visited Ashford Medical Centre during their open house for lower back pain. Bernard their physiotherapist was very patient and take his time to listen to my problem and did a thorough diagnosis. He did a SIS treatment for me. He is knowledgeable, caring and explained what he was doing throughout the whole treatment. He was approachable and ensure that I know how to help myself to get better. Thank you, Bernard, for a job well done!
